Skill.label: 2 link in 6 socket body (sigil of power)
Use this to proc EE if using Malacai Artifice Ring

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Leveling an Absolution Guardian
POB: Trade Site Item Buying: Von Vikton's POE Build List
Underlined = quest reward Bold = purchase from vendor
Level 1: Lightning Tendrills
Level 4: after Tidal Island Holy Flame Totem - Summon Phantasm Summon Raging Spirits Flame Wall - Arcane Surge - Frost Blink
Level 8: Lower Prison WP Holy Flame Totem - Summon Phantasm - Combustion Summon Raging Spirits - Infernal Legion - Minion Dmg (infernal legion highest priority) Flame Wall - Arcane Surge - Frost Blink Raise Zombie - Minion Damage
Level 10: After Brutus Vitality
Level 12: Merveil's Lair Absolution - Summon Phantasm - Minion Damage (you can drop flame totem now) Flesh Offering
Level 16: Intruders in Black +Desecrate +Skitterbots - Vitality (these are your 2 auras until you get Wrath)
Level 18: Spider Quest Minion life - Zombies - Minion Dmg Faster Casting - Arcane Surge - Frost Blink or Flame Dash
Level 24: Lost in Love +Convocation Conductivity Wrath - Vitality (drop skitterbots - dont know if mana will be an issue. If mana is rough then drop vitality)
Level 28: Sever the Right Hand Raise Spectre (lvl up in offhand until you can use a 4 link with Life Tap)
1st 4 Link Absolution - Summon Phantasms - Physical to Lightning - Minion Dmg
Level 31: Library Quest Zombies - Feeding Frenzy - Minion Life - Elemental Army + Life Tap (level up in offhand for spectres later)
Level 34: Breaking the Seal Sigil of Power
Level 38: Eternal Nightmare Absolution - Summon Phantasms - Physical to Lightning - Spell Echo Sigil of Power - Area of Effect
NOTES: If you?re using wands then do this link setup for movement
Flame Dash - Faster Casting - Second Wind - Desecrate
Or this setup if you're using a staff (soulwrest or pledge of hands)
Leap Slam - Faster Attacks - Fortify - Desecrate
Full Setup: Abosolution Summon Phantasms Physical to Lightning Spell Echo Mionion Damage Controlled Destruction
Wrath Vaal Molten Shell Flesh Offering Increased Duration
Leap Slam Faster Attacks Fortify Desecrate
Animate Guardian Spectres Life Tap Meat Shield
Carrion Golem Minion Life Elemental Army Feeding Frenzy
Sigil of Power Area of Effect
